name: Love Is (A) Poison. Tee
description:
-Custom bleached design on 100% cotton Champion® shortsleeve crewneck t-shirt
-Limited to 23 pieces
-Fits True to Size
-Wash with Like Colors
-Hang Dry
-Iron on Low Setting INSIDE OUT ONLY
Keep in mind that each piece slightly varies do to the custom nature of each piece. Each piece is designed with care and needs/ comfortability of the customer in mind. Treat clothing like a fragile painting on a wearable, washable canvas. Continual care and strict following of care procedures, for product, increases longevity and lifespan of the product. You can contact me at antoniowootenjr13@yahoo.com for any further questions, concerns, or requests. I hope to touch the lives of many with my Craft through artwork and satisfied customers. For more images and updates follow on Instagram, @sirdxpe, and like on Facebook, Appreciate The Craft. NO RETURNS OR REFUNDS, not responsible for any damage taking place after arrival of product.

name: HOMEage Tee + Snapback Package
description:
-Hand painted, custom design on 100% cotton Champion® longsleeve White t-shirt AND Hand painted, custom design on Plastic Snap Adjustable Hat ("Splatter Paint Snapback")
-Limited to 4 packages
-Shirt: Fits True to Size; Hat: One Size Fits Most
-Shirt: Wash on Delicate Setting OR Hand Wash, preferred; Hat: Hand Wash carefully OR contact me for prices on hat cleaning and/ or restoration
-Shirt and Hat: Hang Dry
-Shirt: Iron on Low Setting INSIDE OUT ONLY
Keep in mind that each piece slightly varies do to the custom nature of each piece. Each piece is designed with care and needs/ comfortability of the customer in mind. name: Splatter Paint Snapback
description:
-Hand painted, custom design on Plastic Snap Adjustable Hat
-Hat Composition:
  -Dome: 65% Cotton; 35% Polyester with Acid Washed Denim and Camouflage Fabric
  -Bill: Acid Washed Denim with Black Leather lettering
  -Under Bill: Distressed Acid Washed Denim
-Limited to 4 pieces
-Hand wash & Hang Dry OR contact me about pricing for hat cleaning and/ or restoration
-Numbered for authenticity, on tag inside of hat
Keep in mind that each piece slightly varies do to the custom nature of each piece. Each piece is designed with care and needs/ comfortability of the customer in mind.
